patthana21.9:1.1: Naāsavañceva naanāsavañca nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā sāsavo ceva noāsavo ca kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
patthana21.9:2.1: Naāsavañceva naanāsavañca naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā āsavo ceva sāsavo ca akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.9:3.1: Naāsavañceva naanāsavañca naabyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sāsavo ceva no ca āsavo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
